name: Mineral Maniac
description:
This game has been made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 52.

Mineral Maniac is a game where you play as a dwarf who wants to harvest all the minerals from his local cave. Unfortunately the cave is filled with monsters, traps, and ... some weird zebra named Tsevrah that sells shady potions and crystals? Anyways, try to harvest as many minerals as possible and descend as deep into the mines as you can to discover its hidden treasures.

Controls Input Action WASD Move around Mouse Aim where you are attacking Left Mouse ButtonAttackRight Mouse Button
Throw dynamite (once purchased)SpaceDashE Interact with minerals, play the minigame, etc.
